name: Boolean Subquacktions
description:
A kinda game about kinda ducks using kinda psychic powers to kinda get around the map

Keybindings:

E: Levitate Items with your Duck powers

R: Restart Level

M: Return to Main Menu

LeftClick: Attempt to Perform a Boolean Subtraction

RightClick: Attempt to Perform a Boolean Addition

 

Find the Mushrooms, Feed your Ducklings

Don't eat them though, the game is already broken enough as it is.
